headline: Is Debt-Funded Notes Offering Amid Disclosure Suits Altering The Investment Case For Molina Healthcare (MOH)?
summary: In November 2025, Molina Healthcare closed a private offering of US$850 million in 6.500% senior notes due February 2031, raising about US$838 million in net proceeds to fund general corporate purposes, including repayment of delayed draw term loans. At the same time, Molina is contending with multiple shareholder class actions alleging it failed to fully disclose adverse medical cost trends and likely cuts to its 2025 financial guidance, raising questions about its disclosures and risk...
